Title: MEMS Architect & Data Specialist Acoustic (f/m/div.)

 Several years work experience in the field of audio or MEMS design, MEMS characterization, system integration or measurement systems Languages: Fluent English as a must (C1) and advanced German (B2) language skills as a plusEducation: You hold an M.Sc./Dipl. in Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Physics, Microsystems Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or a related field;
